chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
A: Type
f: A -> nat

Goal:
forall (a : nat) (b c : btree A) (l1 l2 l3 : list nat) (l4 l5 l6 : list (btree A)), length l1 = length l4 -> length l2 = length l5 -> length l3 = length l6 -> prod2list (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ a :: l3) (l4 ++ b :: l5 ++ c :: l6) = prod2list (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ a :: l3) (l4 ++ c :: l5 ++ b :: l6)

Premises:
length : forall A : Type, list A -> nat
prod2list = fun (l1 : list nat) (l2 : list (btree A)) => fold_left Init.Nat.add (map2 (fun (a : nat) (b : btree A) => a * sum_leaves f b + weight_tree f b) l1 l2) 0 : list nat -> list (btree A) -> nat Arguments prod2list (_ _)%list_scope
Inductive list (A : Type) : Type := nil : list A | cons : A -> list A -> list A Arguments list _%type_scope Arguments nil {A}%type_scope Arguments cons {A}%type_scope a l%list_scope : rename
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Inductive btree (A : Type) : Type := leaf : A -> btree A | node : btree A -> btree A -> btree A Arguments btree _%type_scope Arguments leaf [A]%type_scope Arguments node [A]%type_scope
prod2list_le_r : forall (a b : nat) (c d : btree A) (l1 l2 l3 : list nat) (l4 l5 l6 : list (btree A)), length l1 = length l4 -> length l2 = length l5 -> length l3 = length l6 -> sum_leaves f d <= sum_leaves f c -> b <= a -> prod2list (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ b :: l3) (l4 ++ d :: l5 ++ c :: l6) <= prod2list (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ b :: l3) (l4 ++ c :: l5 ++ d :: l6)
prod2list_le_l : forall (a b : nat) (c d : btree A) (l1 l2 l3 : list nat) (l4 l5 l6 : list (btree A)), length l1 = length l4 -> length l2 = length l5 -> length l3 = length l6 -> sum_leaves f c <= sum_leaves f d -> a <= b -> prod2list (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ b :: l3) (l4 ++ d :: l5 ++ c :: l6) <= prod2list (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ b :: l3) (l4 ++ c :: l5 ++ d :: l6)
same_length_ex : forall (A B : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A) (l3 : list B), length (l1 ++ a :: l2) = length l3 -> exists (l4 l5 : list B) (b : B), length l1 = length l4 /\ length l2 = length l5 /\ l3 = l4 ++ b :: l5
app_inv_app2 : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list A) (a b : A), l1 ++ l2 = l3 ++ a :: b :: l4 -> (exists l5 : list A, l1 = l3 ++ a :: b :: l5) \/ (exists l5 : list A, l2 = l5 ++ a :: b :: l4) \/ l1 = l3 ++ [a] /\ l2 = b :: l4
prod2list_app : forall (l1 : list nat) (l2 : list (btree A)) (l3 : list nat) (l4 : list (btree A)), length l1 = length l2 -> prod2list (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4) = prod2list l1 l2 + prod2list l3 l4
app_inv_app : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list A) (a : A), l1 ++ l2 = l3 ++ a :: l4 -> (exists l5 : list A, l1 = l3 ++ a :: l5) \/ (exists l5 : list A, l2 = l5 ++ a :: l4)
permutation_transposition : forall (A : Type) (a b : A) (l1 l2 l3 : list A), permutation (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ b :: l3) (l1 ++ b :: l2 ++ a :: l3)
map2_app : forall (A B C : Type) (f : A -> B -> C) (l1 : list A) (l2 : list B) (l3 : list A) (l4 : list B), length l1 = length l2 -> map2 f (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4) = map2 f l1 l2 ++ map2 f l3 l4
permutation_cons_ex_aux : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> forall l11 l12 : list A, l1 = l11 ++ a :: l12 -> exists l3 l4 : list A, l2 = l3 ++ a :: l4 /\ permutation (l11 ++ l12) (l3 ++ l4)
permutation_cons_ex : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation (a :: l1) l2 -> exists l3 l4 : list A, l2 = l3 ++ a :: l4 /\ permutation l1 (l3 ++ l4)
nth_error_split : forall (A : Type) (l : list A) (n : nat) (a : A), nth_error l n = Some a -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ a :: l2 /\ length l1 = n
firstn_le_app1 : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), length l1 <= n -> firstn n (l1 ++ l2) = l1 ++ firstn (n - length l1) l2
permutation_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> list A -> Prop), P [] [] -> (forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> P l2 l1 -> P (a :: l2) (a :: l1)) -> (forall (a b : A) (l : list A), P (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l)) -> (forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> P l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> P l2 l3 -> P l1 l3) -> forall l l0 : list A, permutation l l0 -> P l l0
permutation_app_comp : forall (A : Type) (l1 l2 l3 l4 : list A), permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l3 l4 -> permutation (l1 ++ l3) (l2 ++ l4)
Add_app : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), Add a (l1 ++ l2) (l1 ++ a :: l2)
skipn_le_app2 : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), n <= length l1 -> skipn n (l1 ++ l2) = skipn n l1 ++ l2
nth_split : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l : list A) (d : A), n < length l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ nth n l d :: l2 /\ length l1 = n
skipn_le_app1 : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), length l1 <= n -> skipn n (l1 ++ l2) = skipn (n - length l1) l2
Add_split : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l l' : list A), Add a l l' -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ l2 /\ l' = l1 ++ a :: l2
in_ex_app : forall (A : Type) (a : A) (l : list A), In a l -> exists l1 l2 : list A, l = l1 ++ a :: l2
Inductive permutation (A : Type) : list A -> list A -> Prop := permutation_nil : permutation [] [] | permutation_skip : forall (a : A) (l1 l2 : list A), permutation l2 l1 -> permutation (a :: l2) (a :: l1) | permutation_swap : forall (a b : A) (l : list A), permutation (a :: b :: l) (b :: a :: l) | permutation_trans : forall l1 l2 l3 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> permutation l2 l3 -> permutation l1 l3 Arguments permutation [A]%type_scope (_ _)%list_scope Arguments permutation_nil _%type_scope Arguments permutation_skip _%type_scope _ (_ _)%list_scope Arguments permutation_swap _%type_scope _ _ _%list_scope Arguments permutation_trans _%type_scope (_ _ _)%list_scope
firstn_le_app2 : forall (A : Type) (n : nat) (l1 l2 : list A), n <= length l1 -> firstn n (l1 ++ l2) = firstn n l1
exist_first_max : forall l : list nat, l <> [] -> exists (a : nat) (l1 l2 : list nat), l = l1 ++ a :: l2 /\ (forall n1 : nat, In n1 l1 -> n1 < a) /\ (forall n1 : nat, In n1 l2 -> n1 <= a)
ordered_perm_antisym_eq : forall (A : Type) (order : A -> A -> Prop), (forall a b c : A, order a b -> order b c -> order a c) -> (forall a b : A, order a b -> order b a -> a = b) -> forall l1 l2 : list A, permutation l1 l2 -> ordered order l1 -> ordered order l2 -> l1 = l2
app_comm_cons : forall (A : Type) (x y : list A) (a : A), a :: x ++ y = (a :: x) ++ y

```coq
intros a b c l1 l2 l3 l4 l5 l6 H1 H2 H3.
assert (H4: length (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ a :: l3) = length (l4 ++ b :: l5 ++ c :: l6)).
rewrite app_length, app_length, app_length, app_length.
rewrite H1, H2, H3.
simpl.
auto.

assert (H5: exists l7 l8 : list nat, l1 = l7 ++ a :: l8).
apply same_length_ex with (l3 := l4 ++ b :: l5 ++ c :: l6) in H4.
destruct H4 as [l7 [l8 [H7 [H8 H9]]]].
exists l7, l8.
auto.

destruct H5 as [l7 [l8 H5]].
assert (H6: exists l9 l10 : list (btree A), l4 = l9 ++ b :: l10).
apply same_length_ex with (l3 := l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ a :: l3) in H4.
destruct H4 as [l9 [l10 [H11 [H12 H13]]]].
exists l9, l10.
auto.

destruct H6 as [l9 [l10 H6]].
rewrite prod2list_app, prod2list_app.
rewrite map2_app, map2_app.
simpl.
rewrite <- prod2list_le_r with (l1 := l7) (l2 := l8) (l3 := l2) (l4 := l9) (l5 := l10) (l6 := l5) (a := a) (b := a) (c := b) (d := c).
auto.
rewrite <- prod2list_le_l with (l1 := l7) (l2 := l8) (l3 := l2) (l4 := l9) (l5 := l10) (l6 := l5) (a := a) (b := a) (c := c) (d := b).
auto.
Qed.

original: intros a b c l1 l2 l3 l4 l5 l6 H1 H2 H3. assert (H4: length (l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ a :: l3) = length (l4 ++ b :: l5 ++ c :: l6)). rewrite app_length, app_length, app_length, app_length. rewrite H1, H2, H3. simpl. auto. assert (H5: exists l7 l8 : list nat, l1 = l7 ++ a :: l8). apply same_length_ex with (l3 := l4 ++ b :: l5 ++ c :: l6) in H4. destruct H4 as [l7 [l8 [H7 [H8 H9]]]]. exists l7, l8. auto. destruct H5 as [l7 [l8 H5]]. assert (H6: exists l9 l10 : list (btree A), l4 = l9 ++ b :: l10). apply same_length_ex with (l3 := l1 ++ a :: l2 ++ a :: l3) in H4. destruct H4 as [l9 [l10 [H11 [H12 H13]]]]. exists l9, l10. auto. destruct H6 as [l9 [l10 H6]]. rewrite prod2list_app, prod2list_app. rewrite map2_app, map2_app. simpl. rewrite <- prod2list_le_r with (l1 := l7) (l2 := l8) (l3 := l2) (l4 := l9) (l5 := l10) (l6 := l5) (a := a) (b := a) (c := b) (d := c). auto. rewrite <- prod2list_le_l with (l1 := l7) (l2 := l8) (l3 := l2) (l4 := l9) (l5 := l10) (l6 := l5) (a := a) (b := a) (c := c) (d := b). auto.
